channel.title: No-Ip Help please?
channel.description:
Ok i'm kinda lost on how to work this no-ip thingy ma bob... Ummm like On the page for thos who have it... What am i supposed to do it says the following..
Host Information:
Host Name: ukscape.no-ip.info
Host Type: ( which one do i do? ) DNS Host (A) DNS Host ( Round Robin ) DNS Alias ( CNAME ) Port 80 Redirect Web Redirect ( What do i do in the following box for any of the following above? )
Assign to group: --- ( do i need a group? If so which one o.o? )
Advanced Record: manage
Last update information ( not important )
OFFLINE OPTIONS:
Offline Settings
Offline IP ( what do i put here? ) Web Redirect: | http:// | ( what goes in the box here? ) Offline Page: ( what goes here? ) Enable Offline Mode Now? ( do i mark the box for yes? Or should i not mark the box?)
Mail Options:
MX Record IS THIS EVEN IMPORTANT???? ( Talking about the Mail Options area? ) If so what do i put here??
| | | 5 | | | | 10 | | | | 15 | | | | 20 | | | | 25 |
SPF Wizard ( what's this? )
Please help me out on this information? I just wrote all this down because i really need help :(......[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:32:43 PM[/size][hr]If you know please help me out?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:36:44 PM[/size][hr]CAN ANYONE HELP ME PLEASE?????[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:55:06 PM[/size][hr]I have tried many things like puting my ip in it... under ( DNS Host (A) ) and i have put the Moparscape.org under ( Web Redirect ) And other stuff but i still can not seem to figure it out :(.... Please help me?

item.title: No-Ip Help please?

item.description:
@Wolf_Carmen wrote:

Thank you :D… Where is it at tho o.o?

item.title: No-Ip Help please?

item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

Take a look at Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide for help on No-IP. It’s all there.

Read full topic

item.title: No-Ip Help please?
item.dc:creator: @Wolf_Carmen Wolf_Carmen
item.description:
@Wolf_Carmen wrote:

Ok i’m kinda lost on how to work this no-ip thingy ma bob… Ummm like On the page for thos who have it… What am i supposed to do it says the following…

Host Information:

Host Name: ukscape.no-ip.info

Host Type: ( which one do i do? )
DNS Host (A)
DNS Host ( Round Robin )
DNS Alias ( CNAME )
Port 80 Redirect
Web Redirect
( What do i do in the following box for any of the following above? )

Assign to group: — ( do i need a group? If so which one o.o? )

Advanced Record: manage

Last update information ( not important )

OFFLINE OPTIONS:

Offline Settings

Offline IP ( what do i put here? )
Web Redirect: | http:// | ( what goes in the box here? )
Offline Page: ( what goes here? )
Enable Offline Mode Now? ( do i mark the box for yes? Or should i not mark the box?)

Mail Options:

MX Record
IS THIS EVEN IMPORTANT??? ( Talking about the Mail Options area? ) If so what do i put here??

| | | 5 |
| | | 10 |
| | | 15 |
| | | 20 |
| | | 25 |

SPF Wizard ( what’s this? )

Please help me out on this information? I just wrote all this down because i really need help :(…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:32:43 PM[/size][hr]If you know please help me out?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:36:44 PM[/size][hr]CAN ANYONE HELP ME PLEASE???[br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2007, 12:55:06 PM[/size][hr]I have tried many things like puting my ip in it… under ( DNS Host (A) ) and i have put the Moparscape.org under ( Web Redirect ) And other stuff but i still can not seem to figure it out :(… Please help me?
